company

Class WorkStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • company.WorkStation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessoiresPost, CarBodyPost, DriveTrainPost

    public abstract class WorkStation
extends java.util.Observable
    Represents any workstation in this company. A workstation can contain a car and a log, showing which carparts were already installed during this cycle and how long it took to install them.

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentCar

        public void setCurrentCar(Car current)
        Sets the current Car in this workstation to the given car.

      • getCurrentCar

        public Car getCurrentCar()
        Returns:
        the current job of this workstation

      • install

        public void install(Carpart part,
           int time)
        Installs the given part to the car currently in this WorkStation.
        Parameters:
        part - the carpart that is installed.
        time - the time it took to install the given part.

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns:
        true if all tasks are completed for the current car in this workstation

      • getWorktime

        public int getWorktime()
        Returns:
        the time in minutes that has been spent installing carparts this cycle.

      • getPendingTasks

        public CarpartsSet getPendingTasks()
        Returns:
        a set of tasks that still need to be completed for the current car. If no car is present, returns an empty set.

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        id number of this workstation
